      • ManagedServerSpecCommonImpl

        public ManagedServerSpecCommonImpl​(DomainSpec spec,
                                   Server server,
                                   Cluster cluster,
                                   Integer clusterLimit)
        Constructs an object to return the effective configuration for a managed server.
        Parameters:
        spec - the domain specification
        server - the server whose configuration is to be returned
        cluster - the cluster that this managed server belongs to
        clusterLimit - the number of servers desired for the cluster, or null if not a clustered server
